alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fentress; Overton; Putnam; Van Buren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:24PM CDT until August 12 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Cumberland County in Middle Tennessee... Van Buren County in Middle Tennessee... White County in Middle Tennessee... Central Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Fentress County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 123 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Algood to Sparta to Spencer, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Crossville, Sparta, Spencer, Fairfield Glade, Algood, Monterey, Crab Orchard, Pleasant Hill, Doyle, Hamptons Crossroads, Cumberland Mountain State Park, Slate Springs, Virgin Falls State Natural Area, Rickman, Lake Tansi, Fall Creek Falls State Park, Clarkrange and Indian Rock Lake. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 287 and 340. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Fentress; Overton; Putnam; Van Buren; White
